name: ELECTROSOKO
description:
I'm pleased to present my first finished game! 

ELECTROSOKO

A short 15 min game where you will create electric circuits to help escape the robot SK-8.

Special thanks to my family for your support, and my friend Pablo that helps me during the game development and introduce me to PICO-8.

Thanks for playing.
I hope you enjoy the experience!

Controls
  • Use cursor keys to move SK-8 and push the boxes.
  • Click X to undo a movement.
  • Click Z to restart the room.
Rules SK-8
He's conductive and doesn't want to return to past rooms.Generator
Generates electricity.
Wire
Conduct electricity, but SK-8 can't move it.Box
Sk-8 can push it.
Conductive Box
Like box but well… with conductivity.Closed Doors
When it turns on will open.
